meanings.definition: In a way that is not known or seen by others.
meanings.sent1: She whispered to her friend secretly during the test.
meanings.sent2: The spy secretly passed the information to his contact.
meanings.sent3: The cat secretly watched the mouse, waiting for the perfect moment to pounce.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled secretly in the night sky, hidden by the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was buried secretly under the old oak tree, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: He glanced around secretly before slipping the letter into his pocket.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends planned the surprise party secretly to avoid spoiling the surprise.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel secretly hoarded acorns in its nest, hoping no one would find its stash.
meanings.sent4: The magician pulled the rabbit out of the hat secretly, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious figure moved through the shadows secretly, leaving no trace of their presence.
